author: bago
msg: Made the stage folder a module, so that dependencies installation is managed by a "sister" module and we don't have to deal with the "stage repository hack" in other modules.

author: brett
msg: various versions cannot be < both SNAPSHOT and alpha-1-SNAPSHOT, so use a (hopefully!) unrealistic version in the 2.0.x series as a boundary. Once we get the first 2.1 alpha out, these can be switched to be < 2.1-alpha-1

author: jleroux
msg: Add a numbers line in keyboard and simplify/clean the code + some comments about XUI 800*600 hardcoded dialog size

author: markt
msg: Update doap (based on Bill's suggested patch), add doap to src folder and add copying it to the build process.
